verses.1: “Mi khatʼ biakna pen thunuam a biakna ahih a, amah in a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh bawng hon lak panin a piak leh, amah in Topaʼ mai ah a sitbaang lo pia ding hi.
verses.2: Tua ciangin amah in a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk kongah go dinga, tua ciangin Aaronʼ suan siampite in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
verses.3: Thunuam a biakna panin Topaʼ tungah mei tawh biakna-in a gilpi tuam a thaute le a sungkuateʼ tunga a om a thau khempeuh tawh,
verses.4: a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau le a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin Aaronʼ suante in mei tunga om sing tunga meihal biakpiakna tau tung mahah hal ding uh hi. Tua pen Topa adingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.
verses.6: “ Topaʼ tungah thunuam a a piak ding ama biakna pen tuu le keel honte sung panin a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh ganhing khat ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo pia ding hi.
verses.7: Amah in biak nadingin tuuno khat a piak leh, Topaʼ mai ah pia dinga,
verses.8: a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaronʼ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin thunuam a biakna panin Topaʼ tungah meihal biakna-in a thau, a nung guh ciangah a ki-attan a mei thau buppi le a gilpi tuam a thaute le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
verses.10: a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin siampipa in Topaʼ tungah mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
verses.12: “Ama biakna keel ahihleh, amah in Topaʼ mai ah pia dinga,
verses.13: a lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaronʼ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
verses.14: Tua ciangin Topaʼ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna-in piak dingin a gilpi tuam a thau le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
verses.15: a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin siampipa in a gim namtui dingin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. A thau khempeuh Topa -aʼ ahi hi.
verses.17: Tua pen na khang tawntungun na teenna khempeuh uh ah note in a thau le sisan na nek loh nadingun a tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
